com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.frontend.forms

Class OdpDetailForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rds_software.businesslogic.xwebapp.BusinessLogicState
      • com.rds_software.release.commons.businesslogic.simpleforms.SimpleForm
        • com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.frontend.forms.OdpAbstractForm
          • com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.frontend.forms.OdpDetailForm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable

    public class OdpDetailForm
extends OdpAbstractForm
    ODP Detail Form for displaying and editing payment order information.

    This form operates in two modes:

    • Creation mode: Creates a new ODP for a selected company
    • Edit mode: Edits an existing ODP identified by its ID

    The form displays:

    • Header information: ID, status, dates, protocol number, company
    • Financial details: amount, currency, cost/revenue centers, account
    • Beneficiary information: name, IBAN
    • Authorization workflow grid

    Available actions depend on the mode:

    • Creation mode: CreateOdpAction to save the new ODP
    • Edit mode: UpdateOdpAction to update the existing ODP
    Author:
    RDS Software
    See Also:
    CreateOdpAction, UpdateOdpAction, AuthorizationGrid

      • draw

        public void draw(com.rds_software.release.commons.businesslogic.simpleforms.SimpleApplication appl,
                 int stateTransType,
                 String lastStateID,
                 com.rds_software.release.commons.businesslogic.simpleforms.SimpleEntitiesData simpleEntitiesData)
          throws Exception
        Draws the form UI components.

        Based on the working mode (creation or edit):

        • Adds the appropriate action (Create or Update)
        • Loads the ODP data (creates new or reads existing)
        • Maps ODP data to form entities
        • Renders all form fields and the authorization grid
        Specified by:
        draw in class com.rds_software.release.commons.businesslogic.simpleforms.SimpleForm
        Parameters:
        appl - the application instance for rendering
        stateTransType - the state transition type
        lastStateID - the ID of the last state
        simpleEntitiesData - the entities data container
        Throws:
        Exception - if drawing fails
        See Also:
        SimpleApplication.drawERPParam(com.rds_software.xwebapp.manager.standardelems.CustomElement, com.rds_software.businesslogic.params.ERPParam, java.lang.String, boolean)
